problem_text_cn: 如图,在△ABC中,DE为△ABC的中位线,△ADE的面积是3,则四边形BCED的面积为()
problem_text_en: As shown in the figure, in △ABC, DE is the median line of △ABC, and the area of △ADE is N_0, then the area of quadrilateral BCED is ()
raw_answer: 解:∵DE是△ABC的中位线,∴DE∥BC,DE=\frac{1}{2}BC,∴△ADE∽△ABC,∴\frac{S_{△ADE}}{S_{△ABC}}=\frac{1}{4},∵△ADE的面积=3,∴S~△ABC~=12,则四边形BCED的面积=12-3=9．故选:C．
raw_comment: 此题主要考查了三角形中位线定理以及相似三角形的判定与性质,得出\frac{S_{△ADE}}{S_{△ABC}}=\frac{1}{4}是解题关键．
